prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Synth Pad, Piano, Bass, Organ, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:

This piece of music features Brass, Piano, Bass, Organ, Drums, and a Synth Pad, but no Guitar.

Style 2:

This song is composed of Brass, Piano, Bass, Organ, Drums, and a Synth Pad, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:

Guitar-less, this song is comprised of Brass, Synth Pad, Piano, Bass, Organ, and Drums.
